fields.name: src_branch_desc
fields.caption: Merge From
fields.sqlselect: (select branch_desc from {schema}.v_my_branch_desc src where src.branch_id = branch_merge_id)

Branch_Conflicts_Resolve_Page.sqlexec: update {schema}.branch_page set page_merge_id=@merge_id, branch_page_merge_action=@branch_merge_action where branch_id=@branch_id and page_key=@key and ('RW' = (select branch_access from {schema}.v_my_branch_access access where access.branch_id=@branch_id));

Branch_Conflicts_Resolve_Media.sqlexec: update {schema}.branch_media set media_merge_id=@merge_id, branch_media_merge_action=@branch_merge_action where branch_id=@branch_id and media_key=@key and ('RW' = (select branch_access from {schema}.v_my_branch_access access where access.branch_id=@branch_id));

Branch_Conflicts_Resolve_Menu.sqlexec: update {schema}.branch_menu set menu_merge_id=@merge_id, branch_menu_merge_action=@branch_merge_action where branch_id=@branch_id and menu_key=@key and ('RW' = (select branch_access from {schema}.v_my_branch_access access where access.branch_id=@branch_id));

Branch_Conflicts_Resolve_Sitemap.sqlexec: update {schema}.branch_sitemap set sitemap_merge_id=@merge_id, branch_sitemap_merge_action=@branch_merge_action where branch_id=@branch_id and sitemap_key=@key and ('RW' = (select branch_access from {schema}.v_my_branch_access access where access.branch_id=@branch_id));

Branch_Conflicts_Resolve_Redirect.sqlexec: update {schema}.branch_redirect set redirect_merge_id=@merge_id, branch_redirect_merge_action=@branch_merge_action where branch_id=@branch_id and redirect_key=@key and ('RW' = (select branch_access from {schema}.v_my_branch_access access where access.branch_id=@branch_id));

Branch_Conflicts_Abort.title: Abort Merge
Branch_Conflicts_Abort.sqlexec: update {schema}.branch set branch_merge_id=null, branch_merge_type=null where branch_id=@branch_id and (branch_id in (select branch_id from {schema}.v_my_branch_access where branch_access='RW'))
